titleStmt.title: The noble order, or The honour which God conferr's on them that honour His. Humbly presented to the Lords of Parliament, in a sermon preached before their Honours at the Abby Church at Westminster, January 28. 1645. The solemne day of their publick humiliation. / By Daniel Evance Master of Arts Sid. Suff. Coll. Camb. lesse than the least of them all that serve in the gospell. Clement Danes London.
titleStmt.author: Evance, Daniel.
